snippet.title: PolyGunR Announce Teaser
snippet.description:
From the Designer of the Strike Series and BPM Boy, comes PolyGunR is a physics-based | isometric | run OR gun | shooter.

Coming soon for Atari VCS, Switch, Steam / SteamDeck, XBox.

SITE: https://www.retroninja.com/
Tony Barnes Twitter: https://twitter.com/Twitchfactor
RetroNinja Twitter: https://twitter.com/RetroNinja5
IG: https://www.instagram.com/8bit.ninja/
